tool_description: Analyzes natural and artificial lighting conditions at specific locations and times to optimize portrait photography setup and timing decisions.

session_time.description: Planned session time in YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM format

location_orientation.description: Primary shooting direction: north, south, east, west, or variable

indoor_outdoor.description: Location environment: indoor, outdoor, or mixed

artificial_lighting.description: Whether artificial lighting will be used

error_messages: Invalid location name: Location name cannot be empty
Invalid time format: Use YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM format for session time
Invalid orientation: Must be one of [north, south, east, west, variable]
Time too far in future: Analysis limited to next 14 days
usage: Provide location, planned session time, orientation, and environment type. The tool returns detailed lighting analysis and recommendations for optimal portrait photography.

light_quality_score.description: Overall lighting quality score (0-100) for the specified time

light_direction.description: Primary natural light direction at session time

shadow_conditions.description: Expected shadow characteristics: soft, moderate, harsh, or minimal

lighting_recommendations.description: Specific recommendations for optimizing lighting setup

lighting_summary.description: Summary of lighting conditions and photography implications
